mapper.select: SELECT ps.standardId, ps.name AS standardName, ps.createDate, po.objectName, pt.typeName, sc.companyName, su.userName FROM productive_standard ps LEFT JOIN product_object po ON ps.objectId = po.objectId LEFT JOIN product_type pt ON ps.productTypeId = pt.typeId LEFT JOIN sys_company sc ON ps.companyId = sc.companyId LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON ps.cUserId = su.userId WHERE ps.standardId = #{standardId}
